description: Try our easy to follow Double Choc Ice-Cream Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Double Choc IceCream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top each with a good scoop of ice cream and flatten with a knife. Top with the remaining cake rounds and drizzle over chocolate flavoured topping. Serve immediately
